block.name: invoke_custom_ruby_code
block.description: Execute ruby code: Filter Project Configs

input.code:
# @param input [Hash] input hash supplied in the recipe step
# @return value returned in the last line
# Eg: Code for returning country code for an IP address
# {
#   country_code: get("http://freegeoip.net/json/" + input["ip_address"])
# }
project_config_id = input['project_config_id']
project_configs = input['project_configs']
dependencies = input['dependencies']
final_project_configs = []

if project_config_id.present?
  project_configs = project_configs.where('id !=': project_config_id).each do |x|
    if x[:dependencies].match?(/#{project_config_id}/).is_not_true?
      final_project_configs << x
    end
  end
else
  final_project_configs = project_configs
end

 {
	project_configs: final_project_configs
 }
input.name: Filter Project Configs
